subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|广|t1=building|氐|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – the bottom or base, foundation of a building. Note that 氐 is a figure bowing or stooping, hence connotation of “down”.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[bottom]]; [[underneath]]; [[underside]]
# [[ground]]; [[background]]
# [[ins and outs]]; [[actual]] [[situation]]
# [[master]] [[copy]]
# [[end]] (of a [[year]] or [[month]])
#: {{zh-also|年底|月底}}
#: {{zh-x|六月 底|'''end''' of June|C}}
# [[remnant]]s; [[remain]]s; [[leftover]]s
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} [[inside]]
# {{lb|zh|mathematics}} base (of triangle, logarithm, etc.)
